name: Particle trace
description:
The particles had been travelling for eons, their journey taking them around the center of the galaxy. But with every orbit, they were met with increasing electromagnetic turbulences. The turbulence was making their journey bumpy and difficult, but they persevered.

Finally, after centuries of travel, they reached their destination. They had made it to the heart of the galaxy, and were finally able to rest.

Felt tip ink drawing on wood white smooth grain paper (300gsm)
Pierre Paslier, made in London, 2022 

If you collected a physical plot, get in touch and I will send you the NFT.
